verbs.description: HUNTSVILLE , Ala - [ARG0: Monday night] [V: marked] [ARG1: the first time a sitting American president and the leader of North Korea met face to face] . President Trump and dictator Kim Jong Un met in Singapore for a historic summit .

HUNTSVILLE , Ala - Monday night marked the first time a [V: sitting] [ARG1: American president] and the leader of North Korea met face to face . President Trump and dictator Kim Jong Un met in Singapore for a historic summit .
